org.jetel.util.property

Class PropertiesUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.util.property.PropertiesUtils

  • public class PropertiesUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for Properties handling. Dec 13, 2011 moved from cloveretl.commons/src/com/cloveretl/commons/utils/PropertiesUtils.java as needed also in engine. SVN history lost.
    Since:
    Feb 20, 2009

        Loads properties from stream.
        Parameters:

        is - source for the properties. This method does NOT close the stream.
        Throws:

      • storeProperties

        public static void storeProperties(java.util.Properties properties,
                   java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Stores the given properties ignoring those with an empty string as a value.
        Parameters:
        properties - properties to be stored
        outputStream - an output stream to be used for storage
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if storing fails for any reason

      • storeGraphProperties

        public static void storeGraphProperties(java.util.Properties properties,
                        java.io.OutputStream outputStream,
                        java.lang.String projectPropertyKey,
                        java.lang.String comment,
                        java.lang.String projectSerialPostfix)
        Stores graph properties, storing property with key projectPropertyKey first with special comment.
        Parameters:
        properties - properties to be stored
        outputStream - an output stream to be used for storage
        projectPropertyKey - key of properties stored first
        comment - comment for first property
        projectSerialPostfix - text stored after first property (use '\n\n')

      • parseProperties

        public static java.util.Properties parseProperties(java.lang.String s)
        Converts the given string to Properties. Inverse function for formatProperties(Properties).
        Parameters:
        s - string representation of properties
        Returns:
        properties parsed from the given string

      • formatProperties

        public static java.lang.String formatProperties(java.util.Properties p)
        Formats the given properties to string. Inverse function for parseProperties(String).
        Parameters:
        p - properties to be converted to string
        Returns:
        string representation of the given properties
